comment: The "jew haters" have been banned from most other platforms, so they came here. They are basically folks that struggle to understand what's happening in society, so to simplify things for their minds they resort to "apophenia", "affect heuristic", and "confirmation bias" to process their world view. In a nutshell, resort to the favorite tactic of the left and blame a race for the world's problems.
amr:
# ::snt The "jew haters" have been banned from most other platforms, so they came here. They are basically folks that struggle to understand what's happening in society, so to simplify things for their minds they resort to "apophenia", "affect heuristic", and "confirmation bias" to process their world view. In a nutshell, resort to the favorite tactic of the left and blame a race for the world's problems.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / ban-01
            :ARG1 (p / platform
                  :quant (m2 / most)
                  :mod (o / other))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / hate-01
                        :ARG1 (r / religious-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Jew"))))
            :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / come-01
                        :ARG1 p2
                        :ARG4 (h2 / here))))
      :snt2 (f / folk
            :domain (t / they)
            :mod (b2 / basic)
            :ARG0-of (s / struggle-02
                  :ARG1 (u / understand-01
                        :ARG0 f
                        :ARG1 (e / event
                              :location (s2 / society)))
                  :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / resort-01
                              :ARG0 f
                              :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (a2 / acophenia)
                                    :op2 (a3 / affect-01
                                          :ARG0 f
                                          :ARG1 (h3 / heuristic))
                                    :op3 (b3 / bias-01
                                          :ARG0 f
                                          :ARG1-of (c4 / confirm-01)))
                              :purpose (p3 / process-01
                                    :ARG0 f
                                    :ARG1 (v / view-02
                                          :ARG0 f
                                          :ARG1 (w / world))))))
            :snt3 (r3 / resort-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :part (m3 / mind))
            :ARG1 (t2 / tactic
                  :mod (f2 / favorite)
                  :poss (l / left-19))
            :ARG2 (b4 / blame-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (r4 / race)
                  :ARG2 (p4 / problem
                        :poss w))
            :manner (n2 / nutshell)))

                  :ARG0 (s / slur
                        :mod (h / homophobia)))
            :op2 (h2 / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s)
            :op3 (r / recommend-01
